column1: Specifications: "Managed mobile WiFi router that brings plug-and-play connectivity to any environment. Use the pre-installed AT&T nano-SIM with three data plan options for LTE data
column2: or bring your own AT&T nano-SIM."

column1: Automatic failover between LTE and wired WAN
*Works with the AT&T network. LTE data plan options with the pre-installed AT&T nano-SIM are $15/month for 1 GB

***Mobility Cloud offers secure remote access and full management through the UniFi Mobility Portal for $2/month per Mobile Router. Mobility Cloud is not required when using your own nano-SIM. Basic management
column3: is always available with local access through the UniFi mobile app when connected to a Mobile Router’s WiFi."

column1: "Weight": "Without mount: 257 g (9.1 oz) With mount: 303 g (10.7 oz)"
"Mount material": "Wall mount: polycarbonate DIN rail mount: steel"
"Networking interface": "(2) GbE RJ45 ports LTE Category 4 radio WiFi 4"
"PoE interface": "(1) PoE input\n(1) PoE output* (Max. 10W)*Requires a PoE+ switch."
"LTE throughput speed*": "Download 150 Mbps / Upload 50 Mbps*Speed depends on network coverage and performance at the device location."
"Antennas": "(1) External LTE antenna (main + aux) with TS9 male connectors\n(1) Internal WiFi 2.4 GHz antenna\n(1) Internal GPS antenna"

column4: 1A)*Please refer to the Installation Guide for power socket pinout."

column1: "Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 45° C (-4 to 113° F)"
